preferences.name: targetURL
preferences.title: Print Target URL
preferences.description: This is the page url that will activate the print extension

preferences.name: delay
preferences.title: The delay between printing (silent print only)
preferences.description: This setting helps for printers that have trouble dealing with succesive printting.

preferences.name: silent
preferences.title: Silent Printing
preferences.description: Mark true if you want to use silent printing

preferences.name: printerName
preferences.title: Name of Your printer
preferences.description: The name of the printer you wish to print with.
